As Sarah continued to spread cream on you, some of the girls left the room. They came back with towels and a large basin of water. The next thing you knew, your hair was being washed and conditioned! Then they used a blow-dryer on it, and you could smell the flowery scent of your hair. Then they brushed it out and began to do something. You saw a scissors, and tried to fight your way up again, but it was no use! Soon, Julie was clipping away.

In all of this, you didn't even realize that Sarah had removed all the body hair you had except for your head and, well, one other place. You heard her say, "Yes, this will do." Soon she had the end of a brush, wrapped in a rag, and thickly coated with that hair removing cream. She handed it to you, "Here. Rub this around down there, on both sides and underneath."

You glared at her, "No way! Get lost!"

She grinned, "Okay. I will do it for you then."

She tried to grab the brush, "Arrrgggghhh! Okay, you win!" You did what she wanted.

About that time, Julie said, "There! Not bad! What do you think?"

The girls all agreed that you looked great! Kelley and Emily exclaimed, "Now it is our turn!"

Before you knew what was happening, they were putting makeup on your face! It seemed like a ton of makeup! "Stop that!" You yelled, but it didn't help.

Then you realized something else. Sarah and Rebecca were doing something with your hands and feet, but you couldn't tell what because they wouldn't let you lift you head! It felt like they were filing your nails. They forced you to lie still after what seemed like forever. Meanwhile, Emily and Sarah seemed to be whispering about something.

At last, they let you get up! The girls were all cheering, "He looks so great!" Before you knew it, they were snapping pictures with their phones! Only then did you realize they must have been doing that the whole time!

You cried out, "Stop that! What are you doing?"
1113112.title: His hair

11131121.content:
"Well, now that you look like her type, you've gotta dress the part." Sarah said.

"Dress the part..." you dreaded what could happen next.

"Now, Kris' favorite color is pink and she adores flowers... I know just the outfit!" Emily exclaimed.

She rushed over to Sarah's closet and started going through it, as you started to look down at yourself. The first thing you noticed was your smooth legs, that ended in feet with PINK TOENAILS? You looked at your hands and saw that your fingernails had been filed, so you now had ten rounded, and also pink fingernails as well. You turned towards the mirror, but the mirror was covered. You started to walk over, when Rebecca grabbed your shoulder.

"Nuh uh, it's time to pick your outfit. You can't see the final product til it's done." Rebecca said.

"Now strip." Julie said. "Don't worry, we won't look."

They all turned around and you started to move towards the door.

"And if you're thinking about running, just remember all the pictures we took of you." Kelly said.

You stopped and took off your shirt and underwear.

"All right." Julie said, handing you a pair of panties. "Put these on."

You complied. The girls turned around and Emily walked back, carrying a bundle in her arms.

"Now for this," Rebecca walked over and put a push up bra around your chest, securing it in the back.

You were humiliated, but it was far from over. Emily handed you the bundle, which consisted of a pink dress with the design of flowers on them, and a pair of matching pink heeled sandals.

"Come on now." Sarah said. "I said I'd help you get Kris. This is how you do it."

"And the pictures, don't forget those." Kelly said.

You were defeated. You pulled the dress over your head and put your feet into the heels. Once you did that, the girls started adjusting the dress and hemming and hawing over it. Before long, they were done.

"Now, it's time for the big reveal!" Sarah exclaimed.
11131121.title: Dressing to please Kris

choices: To be with Kris? A reluctant okay.
No. You just can't go into public dressed as a girl.
111311211.content:
You fidgeted as they said that. You looked down at the small rise in your chest from the padding the put in the bra you were wearing. The next thing that you knew, they were moving you and then turning you. When they stopped, you looked around to see what the big deal was. All that you saw were the girls who had been tormenting you for a while now. Then you noticed one girl you didn't recognize. She had short hair and was wearing a pink dress, and was very cute. Then you gasped, and so did she. You realized that the girl in the mirror was you! There was not the least sign of the boy you were. Looking like this, you could have walked into the girl's locker room at school, and nobody would have questioned that you belonged there!

Sarah squealed! "I have such a cute sister!" Her exclamation was accompanied by a series of giggles as you turned a deep crimson.

Emily took you by the hand, "Now let's show Kris!" She took you to your own bedroom, where they had secluded Kris. Emily said, "Only, looking like this, we can't call you Evan. I think Emma would work though!" She open the door and pulled you in. "Kris, meet Emma. She really likes you and thinks you are really hot!"

With that, she ducked out and closed the door! Kris looked at you up and down. "Wow! You are very pretty Emma."

You blushed again, "Thanks, I think. But don't listen to them. I am Evan. They made me dress like this."

Kris giggled, "I know that silly." She walked up to you, "I have no interest in Evan though. Now Emily, that is different." She reached up and pulled you into her, and before you knew it, she was kissing you! Only then did your muddled brain connect the dots of what the girls had been saying to you. The reason they dressed you up like a girl was that Kris was a lesbian!

You let yourself enjoy the kiss. This is what you dreamed of for a long time! When she broke the kiss, you had to catch your breath! Then you said, "Um, Kris. If I understand what is going on, you do know that I am still male, right?"

She squeezed your rear, "Of course, but looking like this, well, you are the first male I ever found attractive." She kissed you again, then said, "Why don't we join the other girls? We are missing the party."

Your heart was thumping! If you had to dress as a girl to spend quality time with Kris, then so be it. "As long as you promise you will consider this, as, well, a date?"

She hugged you, "Gladly!"

So you let her lead you by the hand back to the slumber party. As long as you were with Kris, you found you were able to enjoy yourself, even playing girlish games. When it came to be time to dress for bed time, the girls found a pink nightie that fit you. You felt ridiculous, at least, until Kris snuggled up to you, and in front of everyone, kissed you passionately! You didn't care about the giggles and laughter then! You were happy to fall asleep in Kris's arms!

The next morning, when you woke up, some of the girls had left, but the other's were getting ready for a day of shopping. Kris hugged you, "Come on! We need to get ready! I can't wait to go shopping with you! It will be so much fun!"

You were stunned, "You... you want me to go shopping with you! Okay!" You got up, "Let me go change into something normal, and I will be right down!"

She grabbed your hand and stopped you from going, "You don't understand. I want to go shopping with Emma, not Evan." She sighed, "Please! I will help you get your makeup ready! Please come shopping with me Emma!"

You looked into her eyes. She was serious. She wasn't mocking you or making fun of you in any way. What do you do?
111311211.title: The big reveal

1113112111.content:
You looked at her pleading face. You actually had Kris, the girl of your dreams, asking you to spend the day with her. Well, sort of. She wanted a different you. She wanted Emma. A 'you' that didn't exist twenty-four hours ago. Well, you were already most of the way there, and mom and dad wouldn't be home until late Sunday night, so... "Okay. Why not give it a try." You quickly added, "But if anyone suspects the truth, you have to promise we go home."

She squealed and hugged you, "Oh thank you Emma! And yes, I promise, though I am sure nobody will."

Sarah was surprised but thought it was great, "Cool! Let's have some breakfast, then get Emma ready."

You did eat, and soon you were having your hair and makeup done. The difference was, this time Sarah and Kris insisted that you learn something about it as it was being done. In the end, you wound up in the pink dress they had tried on you last night, only this time you also had to wear pantyhose. It felt strange, but to be honest, it felt nice too.

One thing that you didn't know about was the fact that Kris came from a rich family. Very rich! What that meant to you was that, not only did she drag you into one girl's clothing store after another, making you try on a host of thing, some of which you never heard of before, but also that she actually bought much if it... for you!

What amazed you was how much fun you had with not only Kris, but the other girls who were along. You had always been very socially awkward. You did not develop as fast as other boys your age, so you were small and skinny for you age. You didn't enjoy sports a whole lot, partly because you were no good at them, so that further isolated you. But you enjoyed the chatter of these girls, and sometimes even forgot yourself and joined in!

At the end of the day, you were exhausted! You were also wearing a white, sleeveless top, light blue skirt, pantyhose, and some low heels! You had even gotten used to walking in them by the time it was time to leave.

You were amazed at the ton of girl's clothing that you had to drop off in your room! Dresses, skirts, blouses, tops, jeans, shorts, and a huge variety of undergarments that included bras, panties, pantyhose and many other things. What were you gong to do with this stuff before mom and dad got home?

The night wasn't over yet. When you had finally dropped off that stuff, Kris came to you, "Emma. Would you come with me to a dinner and a movie?"

You smiled, "Sure! Should I get Sarah and the girls?"

She grinned, "Well, I was hoping we could just go together. Um, just the two of us?"

You were stunned! Kris was asking you on a date! You realized that you were staring, "You want to go out with me? I would love to!" It didn't even cross your mind that you said that like a girl.
1113112111.title: To be with Kris? A reluctant okay.

11131121111.content:
You told Sarah where you were going. She just smiled and said, "I hope you have a great time! Kris is a great girl!"

The funny thing that you found was that, when you were with Kris, you tended to defer to her. You also found that you didn't mind being dressed as, and taken for, a girl. If it made her happy, you liked it.

Kris took you to a romantic place for dinner. Afterward, she picked a romantic movie. It is not what you would have normally gone to see, but when Kris put her arm around you, it no longer mattered what was on the screen! Soon the two of you were kissing passionately! You were surprised when Kris slid a hand inside your top, under your bra, and began to play with your nipple! To have her do that to you made a thrill run through your body!

Later, she took one of your hands and placed it on her chest. You had never touched a girl there before, so that was even more incredible! The only down side was that there was no way you could prevent your little soldier from standing at attention with all of this! You were glad that the pleated skirt hid it. Well, mostly.

When the lights came up, both of you were disappointed. And both of you had to do a bit of quick cleanup. You realized that you had absolutely no idea of what the movie had been about, nor did you care.

You walked home actually holding Kris's hand. When she got to your door, she said, "I shouldn't come in." Then she smiled, "I am going to on a river tour tomorrow. Would you like to come along?"

You smiled, "That sounds great! I would love to!"

Kris hugged you, "Great! I will pick you up tomorrow at ten!"

She lifted your hand, "Emma, I want you to know I had a great time tonight. Thank you for going out with me." And with that, she kissed you goodnight. It was a wonderful kiss, full of passion and yet very tender.

It was not until you were starting to go up the stairs to your room that you realized that what had just happened was a true role reversal. It was exactly as you might have hoped with Kris, except that it should have been you walking her home, and kissing her goodnight at her door. She had treated you like 'the girl' in the relationship, and you had enjoyed it!

You noticed Sarah in the living room, so you were very quiet so as not to get her attention. You had such a pleasant time as Kris's date, that you gladly spent the night wearing a nightie that she had bought you.
11131121111.title: A great date!

111311211111.content:
The next morning, you were groggy, but excited at the same time. You got up and wandered downstairs to find Sarah already at the table eating breakfast. You mumbled a good morning to her as you got yourself a bowl of cereal. It was not until you sat down that you realized that she was staring at you, "What are you looking at?"

She shrugged, "Um, nothing I guess. Sorry sis. I should have said 'Good morning Emma' when you came in."

You looked at her confused for a bit, then realized that you were still wearing a nightie and panties! You turned bright red, "Well, it was there so I put it on last night."

Sarah smiled, "I am not giving you a hard time Evan. I meant what I said about Kris. She is a good friend. If the two of you have worked something out, and that means you want to wear girl's clothing, I am okay with that. I am not sure how mom and dad will react though."

You sighed, "I don't want to know." You looked at Sarah and evaluated how much you trusted her, "I will admit, I don't mind it as much as I thought I would. Sometimes I even like the way girl's clothes feel. The real truth though, is that I really like Kris, and I would do anything for her."

Sarah sighed, "You are in love with her! Aren't you?"

You blushed, "It might be a little early to say that, but, well, maybe." You saw the time, "Oh my! And Kris is coming to pick me up at ten! I need to get ready!" You hesitate, "Um, Sarah, could you help me? I mean, I think I can do my hair okay, but the makeup is still a bit of a challenge."

She grinned, "I will, under one condition. That you let me borrow that cute jean skirt you got yesterday, anytime I want."

You grinned, "Deal! As long as I am not wearing it of course!" You both laughed.

1113112111112.content:
You had a great day with Kris! Probably the only thing you felt odd about was that she insisted that you start carrying a purse with some necessities in it to fix your hair and makeup, or refresh your lipstick. It felt odd at first, but by the end of the day, it was just a part of your stuff. Besides, you really didn't have a place to put thing in the dress you were wearing.

That night, Kris kissed you goodnight again, and you were starting to feel like you might really love her! You were riding on a cloud as you finished the kiss and went inside... and almost ran into your mom and dad!

The three of you just stared at each other for a while. Your mom was the first to speak. "We were wondering why our son was out so late. Maybe we should have been concerned about our 'daughter'?"

You stuttered, "I, well, I can explain. You see..."

Sarah came running up, "Wait! I should be the one explaining!" She actually told them about blackmailing you into dressing as a girl at the slumber party. And you were amazed that she totally left out the part of you hiding in her room to look at the girls. Other than, that, she took credit for a lot.

When she was done telling about that first night, you told them of your relationship with Kris, and how happy you were to be around her.

When you were done, your dad looked at you. "Damn Evan. I have to admit. If I didn't know who you were, I would really think you were a girl! What I need to know it, is this what you really want? If you tell me it is, I will support you in it. I won't like it, but I will support it. We don't live in a very open area though. You know what would happen if you got caught by some of your buddies at school, right?"

I sighed, "Yeah, I know. Kris and I talked. She knows it has to be a secret." I knew it was going to be hard, "I really do like her dad. And she will only date me as Emma, not Evan. So yeah, I want to do this. To be honest, sometimes I really like being treated as a girl."

Your mom spoke up now, "In that case, your sister and I need to train you to behave more like a girl, starting when you get home from school tomorrow! From now on, when you are at home, you are Emma. We will see how much you like things as a girl soon! For now, get upstairs young lady! And make sure to take that makeup off! It can be hard to get off of the pillow cases!"
You were going to protest. Yes, you wanted to dress to please Kris, but you weren't ntending to be a full-time girl. Or even part time for that matter! You knew that tone of voice though. Arguing with either of them would have been pointless.

Sarah came up with you. "I will show you how to get it off properly. You will need to be normal for school in the morning."

You stopped and looked at her, "I really want to thank you for supporting me Sarah. You could have made things worse, but you really helped."

She hugged you, "What are sisters for? Besides. This really did start because of me. Come on. Let's get you ready."
1113112111112.title: Cinderella turns into a pumkin (Mom and dad com...

11131121111121.content:
You had to drag yourself out of bed in the morning. When you showered, you made sure to wear your hair in a more male-like fashion. It was funny though. When you looked in the mirror, your face looked odd to you.It took a while to realize that you were looking there expecting to see a girl looking back. Had you changed that much in one weekend?

There was a bit of a panic when you realized that your finger and toenails were still covered in pink nail polish! Thankfully, your mom and Sarah worked together on your hands. Your mom said, "We can worry about the toes later Honey. You won't have gym until tomorrow." She sighed, "I am afraid that you are going to have to go without painting your nails in the future. We can't be doing this all the time. Talk with Kris. Let her know it is either nothing, or maybe some stick-ons until school is over."

Mom also insisted that you wear white cotton panties to school, except on gym days. Wearing panties under your boy clothes felt odd at first, but over time, you dreaded gym days, because the panties were far more comfortable.

Nobody seemed to notice your lack of body hair, You hadn't developed that much anyhow, so it only added to your reputation as being a 'late bloomer'. You found yourself feeling a bit depressed, though you didn't know why. At one point you got to see Kris, but she only gave you a slightly warm smile. Later though, when nobody was looking, she said, "Evan. Be sure to tell Emma I said hello." That made your day!

When you got home, your mom made you change into girl's clothing, this time jeans, and said, "If you are going to be a girl, live like one. You are not going to go anywhere this weekend unless you get your room cleaned up, and I mean spotless!"

And so it went as days went bye. Your mom and Sarah made sure that learned what it was like to be female. You had to cook, and clean, and do wash. There were also intensive lessons on hair, makeup, fashion. You 'never' wanted all of this, but each weekend you were rewarded with time with Kris, who seemed to greatly appreciate your efforts at learning ho to be more feminine. Your encounters with her seemed more and more intense with each weekend that passed. And each Monday was more and more depressing to you.
11131121111121.title: Strange face in the mirror

111311211111211.content:
The one thing that bothered you was that, as close as the two of you were becoming, Kris never seemed to want to invite you, as Emma of course, to her house. You were beginning to think that it was because she was ashamed of her cross-dressing boyfriend. (Or were you her girlfriend?)

When she finally did invite you, she invited you spend the weekend! You were sure that your parents would say no, but they didn't. Not only did they say yes, but there was something strange in the way they were acting too.

You didn't care! Just the thought of spending the weekend with Kris was such a thrill that nothing could bring you down! You were nervous when your dad dropped you off at the huge mansion that was the place where Kris lived. A woman about your parents age opened the door. She was tall and beautiful.

She smiled down at you, "You must be Emma!" She shook your hand, "I am Kris' Aunt Jenny. Please feel free to call me Jenny." She brought you in and showed you up to a room of your own. "I have heard so much about you! I must say, I have never seen Kris smiling more than she has since she met you. And her description of how pretty you are didn't do you justice." She moved some things around, "Make yourself at home. Kris will be here shortly to bring you down to dinner, and afterwards, we can talk some more."

She was so nice, and so bubbly that she made you feel very at home. Kris did show up soon and you were so thrilled you kissed her right off! She kissed you back, and then took you down to eat.

You had a pleasant time, but when the meal was over, Jenny invited you into a smaller room that looked like an office or study. Suddenly, things felt all formal, and Kris seemed to be acting as strangely as your parents.

At last, Jenny spoke straight to you, "Emma. Has Kris told you much about me?" When you indicated that she hadn't, Jenny smiled, "Good. I normally keep things a bit of a secret. You see, I am a privately funded research scientist. I hold seven degrees. Three that involve biology and genetics. And it just so happens that the main thrust of my research is to help people like you."

You looked at her a bit blankly, "People like me?"

She smiled, "Yes. Males that would like to be, or more accurately, appear female." You hadn't thought of yourself that way, but yeah, you were afraid of getting caught almost every time you went out in public. "You see, I have been developing something that would allow many people, especially those looking to pass as female, to make some changes that would not be detectable without close inspection. Very close. However, it would be fully reversible." She paused, "Are you interested?"

You were not sure, "Well, interested enough to hear what you are taking about."

She smiled, "Good answer! You see, I have been playing with a special type of genetic engineering that I have invented. It has a very different focus than what others would call it. You see, I have been working on way to use, well, let's just call them special genetic switches, to actually control parts of the body. By turning some things on, and other things off, I can actually use the genetic information in someone's DNA to reshape almost any external thing about there body. I am calling it genetic body sculpting." She paused, "That is where you come in. If you want to of course."

You stared at her a second, "Um, me?"

Jenny grinned, "Yes. You see, I am looking for test subjects, and with you, at your stage of puberty, are almost perfect. That, along with your desire to appear female of course. You see, there are things I can do to, for instance, reduce, and eventually even hide, your package. And while you could never be a true female, at least not in this generation of the technology, I can manipulate those switches in your body to do a lot of things. I would love to help you, and in the process you could help me."

You were stunned, "Um. This is a lot to take in. I am not sure my parents would approve though."

Jenny handed you some papers. You could see your parent's signature, "I would never offer this to you if your parents had not already agreed. They will support your decision either way."

You were stunned, "What would this mean? I mean, I am not sure I am ready to do this full time. And I would be beat up in school if the guys found out. What would this do to me?"

Jenny grinned, "That is one of the beauties of my process." She set a bottle of pills in front of you, "Your parents got me some genetic samples from your hair brush. These are customized for you. What they would do is, over time, change your crotch area. The first thing that would happen, after about twenty-four to forty-eight hours, is that you would no longer be capable of an erection. As you continued to take the pills, one a day, your 'package' would shrink. You could take the pills until you were where you wanted to be. If you go far enough, eventually, it will be too small for you to pee standing up. If you take them long enough, your body would pull things inside to the point where, externally, you would look like a female"

This frightened you a bit, "Um. I really do want to make Kris happy, but I am not sure I want to give up what I have."

Jenny smiled, "That is the beauty of this procedure. You see, the same switches that can do that, can be used to undo it, with no harm to you. Unlike surgery, I am not removing anything. It would be more accurate to say that I am rearranging things so that, well, some thing are hidden." She paused, "There would be one side effect on you. At some point, your body would cease production of testosterone. That wouldn't hurt you. I have ways off assuring that. However, there would be effects. You would cease male pubescent development until you took the 'antidote' so to speak. At your age, there might even be some regression, such as in your voice. I can only do so much without risking some levels of permanence. I won't do that. Also, your growth pattern and male musculature would slow to what would be more normal for a female. Most likely, you wouldn't gain more than an inch between now and adulthood, at most, if you took these fore more than three or four weeks."

She paused and let all that sink in, "I want to emphasize that, all of the effects are reversible. You do need to understand though. Whatever level you take it to, you will stay there until you take the antidote."

Kris blurted out, "Please do it Emma! Please take them! For me!"

Jenny snapped at her, "Kris! You promised not to do that! He has to make up his own mind!"

Kris looked sad, "I am sorry Aunt Jenny. And I will still like you as you are if you don't take them Em... Evan."

Your heart almost broke to see Kris look like that. "It is fully reversible? Any time?"

Jenny nodded, "The only thing is, I won't allow jumping back and forth. When you reverse it, that will be permanent, at least until you are an adult. You can stop taking them for a while, and come back later and go farther, but no back and forth."

You picked up the bottle and stared at this small thing that could alter your life. What do you do?

info.brief_description: A boy is caught spying on his sister's sleepover, and they decide that he should join them
info.description:
When a boy gets caught spying on his sister's slumber party, they decide he should join them, and he's in for a wild night. Also, the story can can continue after the slumber party ends.

Here are a few rules-

NO SEX
NO MENTION OF GENITALIA However, you can allude to it.
NO GOING TO A CHOICE AND WRITING "WHAT COLOR" OR "IS IT THIS OR SOMETHING ELSE"

Otherwise, have fun!
